attributes.action: Stop sex education for younger children
attributes.additional_details:
Children are being robbed of their childhood. Introducing sex education in young children will expose them to things they shouldn't have at that age. Children as young as 4 are going to taught . 
Depriving children the chance to be children,  sexualising them . 
Sexual education should be taught a secondary school level.
attributes.background: Young children should not be exposed to any sexual information. Children have a right to be children
